thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk
thread.title: Dion Williams
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Dion Williams

author: Dion Williams
title: Dion Williams
text: Booking process all went smoothly accept when I got to the hotel in NY I only had heating for one day. I contacted Flight Guru in turn said they contacted the hotel. That I cannot verify. For the whole of my trip I had no heating in my room and myself and child were sleeping in our dressing gowns. I have now contact Flight Guru about my trip since I have been back and told them that I was not satisfied with the treatment by the hotel and I would like to recoup some of the money. They have brushed my complaint off. They said they would get in contact with the hotel, I rang and chased and nothing has been rectified. I have heard nothing since. Very disappointed!
